Lack enough support: The claim lacks any supporting evidence or a story to back it up. It is merely a headline without any accompanying content.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Robert Redford made a statement suggesting that Michelle and Barack Obama should be imprisoned, without providing any credible source or evidence.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Obama awarded Redford the Presidential Medal of Freedom, which indicates a positive relationship between them.
Exaggerate: The claim uses a sensational headline to grab attention and create controversy, even though there is no substantial evidence to support it.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim is identified as a hoax that has been circulated by people peddling misinformation. Similar hoaxes targeting other celebrities have also been identified.
